heading: HB09039
0: AN ACT REPEALING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10912, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "CONTINUING PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT ACT OF 2016"
principal-authors: SALO, RON P.; HERNANDEZ, PAUL P.;
status: Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09039
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REPEALING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10912, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "CONTINUING PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT ACT OF 2016"
ABSTRACT : Aims to address the failure in the implementation of Republic Act No.10912 whose primary objective or policy is to provide lifelong learning among professionals in the country. Intends to resolve once and for all various complaints from among the members of regulated professions which imposed unnecessary burdens among Filipino professionals.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALO, RON P., HERNANDEZ, PAUL P.
DATE FILED : 2019-02-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2018-11-12
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2019-02-07
